title: Cooler Master SL600M - Beautiful Case, Challenging Airflow!
description: The Cooler Master SL600M is an awesome looking gaming PC case with some unique ideas but challenging airflow.  Can it really compete at a $199 price point though?    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  LiqFusion AIO:    Phanteks Evolv X Black:   Phanteks Evolv X Silver:   Define S2:   H500M:   Strimer:   Emermax TB RGB:   CoolerMaster Riser Cable:  Noctua U12S:   RTX 2080 Ti DUKE:   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Cooler Master. This video is sponsored by Enermax. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #coolermaster #casereview #sl600m #hardwarecanucks
